DataElement.preferredName: De Novo Glioblastoma Occurrence Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to indicate whether or not a brain tumor is the first occurrence of Glioblastoma Multiforme, which forms from glial (supportive) tissue of the brain and grows quickly. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: (dih NO-vo) In cancer, the first occurrence of cancer in the body._(glee-o-blas-TOE-ma mul-tih-FOR-may) A type of brain tumor that forms from glial (supportive) tissue of the brain. It grows very quickly and has cells that look very different from normal cells._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (dih NO-vo) In cancer, the first occurrence of cancer in the body.:A malignant form of astrocytoma histologically characterized by pleomorphism of cells, nuclear atypia, microhemorrhage, and necrosis. They may arise in any region of the central nervous system, with a predilection for the cerebral hemispheres, basal ganglia, and commissural pathways. Clinical presentation most frequently occurs in the fifth or sixth decade of life with focal neurologic signs or seizures.

Concepts.definition: Anew, afresh, or over again from the beginning.

The most malignant astrocytic tumor (WHO grade 4).  It is composed of poorly differentiated neoplastic astrocytes and is characterized by the presence of cellular polymorphism, nuclear atypia, brisk mitotic activity, vascular thrombosis, microvascular proliferation, and necrosis. It typically affects adults and is preferentially located in the cerebral hemispheres. (Adapted from WHO)

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
